Kasus Manipulasi, Dua Petinggi 'Produce X 101' Resmi Ditahan
06 Nov 2019, 14:38 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Dua petinggi 'Produce X 101' resmi ditahan atas dugaan manipulasi jajak pendapat (japat) alias voting dalam ajang pencarian bakat tersebut. (dok. YouTube/Mnet)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Dua petinggi 'Produce X 101' resmi ditahan menyusul penyelidikan atas dugaan manipulasiÂ jajak pendapat (japat) alias voting dalam ajang pencarian bakat tersebut. Pada Selasa (5/11) malam, hakim di Pengadilan Distrik Pusat Seoul menyatakan bahwa Direktur Produksi CJ ENM Ahn Joon Young dan Kepala Produser Kim Yong Bum secara sah ditahan.Sebelumnya, Mnet mengungkapkan bahwa polisi telah mengeluarkan surat perintah penangkapan untuk beberapa anggota staf "Produce X 101". Pada 4 November, dilaporkan bahwa orang-orang tersebut termasuk Ahn Joon Young, Kim Yong Bum, serta seorang PD bernama "Lee," dan wakil presiden Starship Entertainment "Kim."Saat itu, polisi juga meminta agar sejumlah nama tersebut diberikan pencekalan bepergian.Sehari setelahnya, Pengadilan Distrik Pusat Seoul mengadakan sesi pemeriksaan untuk memutuskan apakah surat perintah penangkapan tersebut sah atau tidak.Pada malam yang sama, News1 melaporkan bahwa hakim kepala Myung Jae Kwon telah membuat keputusan terakhir tentang validitas surat perintah penangkapan. Surat perintah penangkapan Ahn Joon Young dan Kim Yong Bum dianggap sah dan mereka secara resmi ditahan."Sebagian besar dakwaan pidana telah dijelaskan, menunjukkan bahwa ini adalah masalah penting. Ketika saya mempertimbangkan peran Ahn Joon Young dalam kasus ini dan penyelidikan polisi yang telah berlangsung sampai sekarang, saya mengakui bahwa pemenjaraan adalah perlu dan masuk akal," kata Jae Kwon, dikutip dari Soompi.Kim Yong Bum juga ditahan karena alasan yang sama. Hakim memutuskan bahwa orang-orang ini secara umum mengakui kejahatan mereka atau bukti telah dikumpulkan tentang mereka. Pihak berwenang juga menyatakan bahwa tidak ada masalah dalam status sosial, status tempat tinggal tersangka, atau status keluarga yang menyarankan mereka perlu dipenjara karena kasus tersebut dengan tujuan penyelidikan yang sedang berlangsung.Kepolisian telah memulai proses investigasi kasus dugaan kecurangan ini sejak beberapa bulan lalu. Hal ini bermula dari kecurigaan para penggemar yang melihat pola angka tertentu dari hasil akhir musim keempat acara tersebut. Akibatnya, beberapa kandidat tersingkir secara tidak adil.Mnet juga dicurigai telah bekerja sama dengan beberapa label agensi untuk menentukan line-up debut di Produce.Sebelumnya lima agensi entertainment telah diperiksa oleh kepolisian. Salah satunya adalah Starship Entertainment yang menaungi Minhee dan Hyeongjun X1. Polisi juga sempat mengamankan ponsel staf sebagai barang bukti.Selain itu polisi turut memeriksa jika ada kecurangan yang dilakukan pada acara Produce musim sebelumnya, serta acara Idol School yang juga dibuat oleh Mnet.Ajang pencarian bakat Produce X 101 dianggap sebagai salah satu kompetisi idola K-Pop yang paling sukses dalam 10 tahun terakhir. Tidak hanya itu, ajang ini juga menjadi salah satu jalan yang menjanjikan untuk para bintang K-Pop mengawali karier. (agn/end)

Manipulation Case, Two Officials 'Produce X 101' Officially Detained
Nov 6 2019, 14:38 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Two officials of 'Produce X 101' were officially arrested on suspicion of poll manipulation (japat) alias voting in the talent search event. (doc. YouTube / Mnet)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Two senior 'Produce X 101' officials were arrested following an investigation into alleged poll manipulation (japat) alias voting in the talent search event. On Tuesday (11/5) night, a judge at the Seoul Central District Court stated that CJ ENM Production Director Ahn Joon Young and Chief Producer Kim Yong Bum were legally arrested. Earlier, Mnet revealed that police had issued arrest warrants for several staff members " Produce X 101 ". On November 4, it was reported that these people included Ahn Joon Young, Kim Yong Bum, and a PD named "Lee," and Starship Entertainment's vice president "Kim." At that time, police also requested that a number of these names be given a travel ban. The day after, the Seoul Central District Court held an examination session to decide whether the arrest warrant was valid or not. On the same night, News1 reported that chief judge Myung Jae Kwon had made a final decision on the validity of the arrest warrant. The arrest warrants for Ahn Joon Young and Kim Yong Bum are considered valid and they are officially detained. "Most criminal charges have been explained, indicating that this is an important issue. When I consider Ahn Joon Young's role in this case and the police investigation that has lasted until now, I recognize that imprisonment is necessary and reasonable, "said Jae Kwon, quoted from Soompi. Kim Yong Bum was also arrested for the same reason. The judge ruled that these people generally admitted their crimes or that evidence had been gathered about them. The authorities also stated that there were no problems in the social status, status of the suspect's residence, or family status that suggested they needed to be jailed because of the case for the purpose of ongoing investigation. The police had begun the process of investigating this alleged fraud case several months ago. This stems from the suspicion of fans who see a certain number pattern from the final results of the fourth season of the event. As a result, several candidates were eliminated unfairly .net was also suspected of having collaborated with several agency labels to determine the debut line-up in Produce. Previously five entertainment agencies had been questioned by the police. One of them is Starship Entertainment which houses Minhee and Hyeongjun X1. The police also had time to secure staff's cellphones as evidence. In addition, the police also examined if there was fraud committed at the previous season's Produce event, as well as the Idol School event which was also made by Mnet. The Produce X 101 talent search event was considered as one of the K-idol competitions. The most successful pop in the last 10 years. Not only that, this event also became one of the promising avenues for K-Pop stars to start their careers. (agn / end)
